attributes.action: Return our Nation back to Christian values and social justice that have been the very foundation of our way of life in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are a family of christian believers  who care about our Nation. That it may turn from its sin and repent before God. We have known God's grace for many years and He has blessed us. We invite all believers to join us because TOGETHER we can save our Nation from Judgement.
